item.description:
From the R J Julia Website;

Saturday, May 10 @ 12 Noon - 3:00 PM

Barbara Walters - Book Signing

RJ Julia

Legendary personality Barbara Walters will be visiting us on May 10th from 12 noon - 3:00 p.m.
for a signing of her new book, Audition - an extremely candid memoir and a fascinating look at
her early life and the price you have to pay on the path to success.

Please note: Barbara Walters will only be signing books purchased at R.J. Julia.

Please stop into the store or call us right away at 203-245-3959 to buy a book.

We hope to see you there! But if you can't make it, don't worry.
We'll be happy to get your copy of Audition autographed and hold it for you here at the store,
or send it anywhere you'd like.


To reserve seats, call 203.245.3959 or 800.74.READS.

Directions to RJ Julia Booksellers in Madison, CT

From the south/west (New Haven, New York):

1. I-95 North to Exit 61.

2. Right at the end of the ramp onto Rte 79.

3. Left at third light onto Rte 1.

Our store (with green window boxes) is 3/4 down the block on the right hand side,
across from the movie theatre. There is both on-street parking as well as a back parking lot
with a rear entrance to the store. To get to the back parking lot, continue past the store
and take a right at the very next light. Then take a quick right into the parking lot.
You are welcome to park in the gravel lot closest to the store.

http://www.rjjulia.co...

www.rjjulia.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for where Barbara Walters is giving her lecture. We might be somewhere around there.
item.why: Who is in commuting distance of Madison.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Gets A View Of Barbara Walters
